SA15jithettu:1: pratyakṣam anumānaṃ ca sābhāsaṃ tv ātmasaṃvide //
SA15jithettu:8: sapakṣa eva sattvam iti dvitīyaṃ rūpam /
SA15jithettu:9: vipakṣe cāsattvam eva niścitam iti tṛtīyam //
SA15jithettu:10: 4. tatra pakṣaḥ prasiddho dharmī prasiddheṇa viśeṣeṇa viśiṣṭaḥ svayaṃ sādhayitum iṣṭaḥ pratyakṣādyaviruddhaḥ /
SA15jithettu:11: yathā śabdo dharmī anityatvena viśeṇa viśiṣtaḥ sādhyate kṛtakatvād iti hetuḥ //
SA15jithettu:13: sādhyadharmeṇa sāmānyena samānaḥ sapakṣo yathā ghaṭādir iti //
SA15jithettu:15: yatra sādhyābhāvena hetor abhāvo niyamena kathyate [ yathākāśādir iti //
SA15jithettu:16: 7. etad eva ca hetos trirūpavacanaṃ parapratyāyanāya prayujyamānaṃ parārtham anumānam ucyate /
SA15jithettu:17: yathā anityaḥ śabda iti pakṣavacanaṃ kṛtakatvād iti hetuvacanam /
SA15jithettu:24: yat kṛtakaṃ tat sarvam anityaṃ dṛṣṭam /
SA15jithettu:28: asaty anityatve na bhavaty eva kṛtakatvaṃ yathākāśādau /
SA15jithettu:35: yathā dhūmādir dharmībuddhimatā hetunā janyata iti sādhye /
SA15jithettu:42: nānumānaṃ pramāṇam iti parapratipādanāya vacanam uccāryamāṇaṃ parārtham anumānam ity uktatvāt //
SA15jithettu:47: kiyatkālasthāyino 'pi kṛtakāḥ sarve nityā iti lokapratīteḥ //
SA15jithettu:49: vaiśeṣikasya sāṃkhyaṃ prati vināśī śabda iti sādhye //
SA15jithettu:51: sāṃkhyasya bauddhaṃ prati ātmā cetana iti sādhayataḥ //
SA15jithettu:65: 25. tatra yo hetuḥ sapakṣavipakṣayor ubhayatrāsti nāsti vā saṃdihyate /
SA15jithettu:68: 26. ubhayāsiddhaḥ tadyathā śabdasyānityatve sādhye cākṣuṣatvaṃ hetuḥ vādiprativādinor asiddhaḥ //
SA15jithettu:69: 27. cetanās tarava iti sādhye sarvatvagapaharaṇe maraṇād iti hetuḥ prativādino bauddhasyāsiddha iti prativādyasiddhaḥ /
SA15jithettu:72: utpattimattvād iti hetuḥ svayaṃ vādinaḥ sāṃkhyasyāsiddhaḥ /
SA15jithettu:74: 29. vaiśeṣikasya bauddhaṃ prati kṣamādikaṃ dharmī kāryam iti sādhayataḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ sadṛśāparāparotpatter iti svayaṃ vādino 'siddhaḥ /
SA15jithettu:75: utpattau siddhāyām api pratikṣaṇasadṛśāparāparotpattir ity asiddhaḥ //
SA15jithettu:80: na hi sarve vṛkṣā rātrau patrasaṃkocabhājaḥ //
SA15jithettu:81: 31. tathā pṛthivyādikaṃ dharmī buddhimaddhetujanyam iti sādhye kāryatvād iti hetur bauddhaṃ praty asiddhaḥ /
SA15jithettu:82: pratyakṣānupalambhanibandhano hi kāryakāraṇabhāvo bauddhasya pṛthivyādau na siddhaḥ /
SA15jithettu:84: 32. saṃdigdhāsiddho yathā yady ayaṃ dhūmo 'gnir atreti sādhye hetor evāniścayāt //
SA15jithettu:86: iha bahuṣu nikuñjeṣu kvacid ekasmin nikuñje mayūra iti sādhye kekāyikād iti hetuḥ //
SA15jithettu:87: 34. dharmyasiddhāv apy asiddho yathā ātmā dharmī sarvagata iti sādhye sarvatropalabhyamānaguṇatvād iti hetuḥ //
SA15jithettu:90: 37. yathā śabdasya nityatvādike dharme sādhye prameyatvaṃ hetuḥ sapaksvipakṣayoḥ sarvatra vartamānaḥ sādhāraṇānaikāntikaḥ //
SA15jithettu:91: 38. tathā śabdasya nityatve śrāvaṇatvaṃ hetuḥ sapakṣavipakṣayor apravartamānāt /
SA15jithettu:95: aprayatnānantarīyakaḥ śabdasya vidyudākāśādiḥ sapakṣaḥ tatraikadeśe vidyudādau vartate 'nityatvaṃ nākāśādau prayatnāntarīyakaḥ punaḥ sarvo ghaṭādir vipakṣaḥ /
SA15jithettu:98: 40. tathā prayatnānantarīyakatve śabdasya sādhye 'nityatvaṃ hetuḥ ghaṭādau sarvatra vidyate /
SA15jithettu:101: tasmād ayaṃ vipakṣaikadeśavṛttiḥ sapakṣavyāpī hetur anaikāntikaḥ //
SA15jithettu:103: śabde dharmiṇi nityatve sādhye 'mūrtatvād iti hetuḥ /
SA15jithettu:105: tatraikadeśe 'mūrtatvam ākāśe pravartate na paramāṇau mūrtatvāt paramāṇūnam /
SA15jithettu:108: 42. tathā saṃdigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttikaḥ sapakṣavyāpī hetur anaikāntiko yathā /
SA15jithettu:109: kapilādidharmy asarvajña iti sādhye vaktṛtvād iti hetuḥ /
SA15jithettu:112: sarvajñasyātīndriyatvād vacanam asti na veti saṃdigdham //
SA15jithettu:113: 43. tathā saṃdigdhasapakṣavṛttir vipakṣavyāpl hetur anaikāntiko yathā /
SA15jithettu:114: ṛṣabhavardhāmānādidharmī sarvajña iti sādhye kevaliśāstrakaraṇād iti hetuḥ sapakṣe sarvajñe saṃdigdhaḥ /
SA15jithettu:117: 44. saṃdigdhānvayavyatirekahetur anaikāntiko yathā sātmakaṃ jīvaccharīraṃ prāṇādimattvād iti hetuḥ /
SA15jithettu:118: jīvaccharīrasaṃbandhī prāṇādir na sātmake anātmake vā pravṛtto nivṛtto veti niścīyate //
SA15jithettu:121: 46. tathā dvitīyo 'pi kevalavyatirekī nedaṃ nirātmakaṃ jīvaccharīram aprāṇādimattvaprasaṅgād iti /
SA15jithettu:122: dṛṣṭāntābhāvād eva nānvayaniścayo nāpi vyatirekaniścaya iti saṃśayahetuḥ //
SA15jithettu:125: 49. yathā śabdo dharmī nitya iti sādhyo dharmaḥ kṛtakatvād ākāśādivat /
SA15jithettu:126: ayaṃ hetur ghaṭādau vipakṣa evāsti na sapakṣe //
SA15jithettu:127: 50. tathā śabdo dharmī nitya iti sādhye prayatnānantarīyakatvād iti hetur ākāśādau sapakṣe nāsty eva /
SA15jithettu:131: cakṣurādaya iti dharmī parārthā iti sādhyo dharmaḥ saṃghatatvād iti hetuḥ /
SA15jithettu:133: ayaṃ tu hetur yathā cakṣurādīnāṃ pārārthyaṃ sādhayati /
SA15jithettu:136: 52. dharmisvarūpaviparītasādhano yathā pṛthivyādir dharmī buddhimaddhetujanya iti sādhye sāśrayatvād iti hetuḥ /
SA15jithettu:138: ayaṃ hetur yathā buddhimaddhetujanyatvaṃ sādhayati tathā buddhimataḥ kartuḥ sāśrayatvam api sādhayati //
SA15jithettu:140: vaiśeṣikasya mīmāṃsakaṃ praty ātmā dharmī cetayata iti sādhye [Htu_267] cetanādhiṣṭhānatvād iti hetur ātmano 'cetanasya yathā caitanyaṃ sādhayati /
SA15jithettu:141: tathā hetur ayam anityatvam api sādhayati /
SA15jithettu:144: 55. viruddhāvyabhicārī nāma na kaścid dhetudoṣo 'stīti na tasyodāharaṇaṃ yuktam /
SA15jithettu:146: yat sarvadeśāvasthitaiḥ svayaṃ ca svasaṃbandhibhir yugapad abhisaṃbadhyate tat sarvagatam /
SA15jithettu:148: abhisaṃbadhyate ca sarvadeśāvasthitaiḥ svasaṃbandhibhir yugapat sāmānyam iti pailukasya svabhāvahetuprayogaḥ /
SA15jithettu:151: yad upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ yatra nopalabhyate na tatrāsti /
SA15jithettu:154: anupalambho hetuḥ pūrvoktaś ca svabhāvaḥ parasparaṃ bādhayataḥ /
SA15jithettu:156: 56. na sapakṣād anyo dṛṣṭānto nāma kaścid iti sapakṣa eva sādharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ //
SA15jithettu:168: [Htu_268] tatra dṛṣṭānte rathyāpuruṣe rāgādimattvaṃ saṃdigdhaḥ paracetovṛttīnāṃ duranvayatvāt //
SA15jithettu:170: kaścit puruṣo maraṇadharma iti sādhye rāgādimattvād iti hetuḥ /
SA15jithettu:173: 63. saṃdigdhobhayadharmā dṛṣṭāntābhāso yathā kaścit puruṣo dharmī asarvajña iti sādhye rāgādimattvād iti hetuḥ /
SA15jithettu:181: atra vidyamāno 'py anvayo vyāptyā na darśita iti /
SA15jithettu:184: yad anityaṃ tat kṛtakaṃ ghaṭādivad ity atrānityatvaṃ sādhyam /
SA15jithettu:186: na tu sādhanena vyāptaṃ sādhyaṃ kathyate /
SA15jithettu:192: atra paramāṇor vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntatvād amūrtatvaṃ sādhanadharmo vyāvṛtto [Htu_269] mūrtatvāt paramāṇūnām /
SA15jithettu:201: atrākāśādau vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntāt sādhyaṃ sādhanaṃ ca na vyāvṛttam //
SA15jithettu:208: yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sa jyotirjñānādikam upadiṣṭavān yathā ṛṣabhavardhamānādir iti /
SA15jithettu:209: atra vaidharmyodāharaṇād ṛṣabhavardhamānāder asarvajñatā nivṛttāna veti saṃdehaḥ //
SA15jithettu:211: nātra trayīvidā brāhmaṇena grāhyavacanaḥ kapilakaṇādādiḥ puruṣo rāgādimattvād iti /
SA15jithettu:212: atra vaidharmyodāharaṇaṃ ye grāhyavacanā na te rāgādimanto yathā gautamādayo dharmaśāstrāṇāṃ praṇetāra iti gautamādibhyo rāgādimattvasya dharmasya vyāvṛttiḥ saṃdigdhā //
SA15jithettu:215: atra vaidharmyodāharaṇaṃ yo vītarāgo na tasya parigrahāgrahau saṃbhavataḥ [Htu_270] yathā ṛṣabhavardhamānāder iti /
SA15jithettu:216: ṛṣabhāder vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntāt avītarāgatvaṃ sādhyadharmaḥ parigrahāgrahayogaḥ sādhanadharmo vyāvṛtto na veti saṃdehaḥ /
SA15jithettu:219: tau ca dvāv api ṛṣabhādau saṃbhavyete /
SA15jithettu:224: yatrāvītarāgatvaṃ nāsti na sa vaktā yathopalakhaṇḍa iti /
SA15jithettu:225: yady upalakhaṇḍād ayaṃ vyāvṛttas tathāpi sarvo vītarāgo vakteti saṃdehaḥ //
SA15jithettu:228: paramārthataḥ saṃyag dṛṣṭānto 'py ayaṃ vaktṛdoṣād dṛṣṭāntābhāsaḥ /
SA15jithettu:230: tathā hi yan nityaṃ tat sarvaṃ niyamenākṛtakaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathākāśādir iti vacanena vibhajya vaktrā vyāptipūrvako vyātireko na pradarśita ity apradarśitavyatirekaḥ //
SA15jithettu:232: yad akṛtakaṃ tan nityaṃ dṛṣṭam iti /
SA15jithettu:233: atra sādhananivṛttyā sādhyanivṛttir vyāptā darśayitavyā tena yatra yatra sādhyanivṛttis tatra tatra niyamena sādhananivṛttiḥ sidhyatīti //
SA15jithettu:236: vādinā sādhayitum iṣṭam arthaṃ na sādhayantīti sādhanābhāsā [Htu_271] vādino bhavanti /
SA15jithettu:237: evaṃ ca prativādinā dūṣaṇatvenopanyastā dūṣaṇāni bhavanti /
SA15jithettu:239: sādhanasya nyūnatodbhāvanam eva dūṣaṇasya lakṣaṇaṃ vibhajya pṛthag ucyate /
SA15jithettu:242: yadā pūrvapakṣavādī mithyādūṣaṇatvena pratipādayatīti tadā dūṣaṇābhāsā jātaya iti paṭhyante /
SA15jithettu:245: aduṣṭadṛṣṭānte dṛṣṭāntadoṣopādānaṃ dūṣaṇābhāsa iti nyāyāt / J
SA15jithettu:246: 84. tatra pratijñāhetudāharaṇopanayanigamanāni pañcāvayavaṃ paraiḥ sādhanam ucyate /
SA15jithettu:247: yathānityaḥ śabda iti pratijñā kṛtakatvād iti hetuḥ /
SA15jithettu:248: yat kṛtakaṃ tat sarvam anityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā ghaṭādīty udāharaṇam /
SA15jithettu:251: dṛṣṭānte pratītisamartho hetur dharmiṇy upanīyata ity upanayaḥ /
SA15jithettu:255: 85. tathā hi / vādakāle vyāptipūrvaka eva prayogaḥ kartavyaḥ /
SA15jithettu:256: yat kṛtakaṃ tat sarvam anityaṃ dṛstaṃ yathā ghaṭādir iti /
SA15jithettu:257: sādhyena sādhanasya dṛṣṭānte vyāptikathanam anvaya ucyate //
SA15jithettu:258: 86. vipakṣe ca sādhyanivṛttyā sādhananivṛttir vyatireka ucyate yathāsaty anityatve na bhavaty eva kṛtakatvaṃ yathākāśādau /
SA15jithettu:262: 88. tathā sādharmyavati prayoge 'nvayābhidhānasāmarthyād eva vyatireko 'vagantavya iti na pṛthag ucyate /
SA15jithettu:263: yathā yat kṛtakaṃ tat sarvam anityaṃ draṣṭavyam /
SA15jithettu:267: tathā vaidharmyavati prayoge vyatirekoktisāmarthyād evānvayaḥ pratipanna iti nānvayaḥ punar ucyate /
SA15jithettu:268: yan nityaṃ tad akṛtakaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathākāśādiḥ kṛtakaś ca śabda iti /
SA15jithettu:273: pratigatam āśritam akṣaṃ yad vijñānaṃ tat pratyakṣam /
SA15jithettu:275: atyādayaḥ krāntādyarthe dvitiyayeti samāsena pratyakṣaśabdo vācyaliṅgaḥ siddhaḥ /
SA15jithettu:278: 91. cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyākhyāni pañcendriyāṇi tadāśritāni pañca jñānāni pramāṇāni /
SA15jithettu:280: 92. tac ca pratyakṣaṃ nāmajātyādikalpanārahitaṃ nirvikalpakam abhrāntaṃ ca yadi bhavati /
SA15jithettu:286: viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyam [Htu_273] iti kalpanā nīlotpalam iti jñānaṃ /
SA15jithettu:289: śuktikāyāṃ rajatajñānaṃ sthāṇur ayaṃ puruṣo veti jñānam /
SA15jithettu:295: 95. tasya viṣayaḥ svalakṣaṇam arthakriyāsamarthaṃ tu svalakṣaṇam ucyate /
SA15jithettu:298: pramāṇam arthapratītirūpaṃ phalaṃ ca tādṛśam eva /
SA15jithettu:302: gṛhīte ca pakṣadharme smṛte ca sādhyasādhanabhāve paścāt pratipattā yathārthaṃ pratipadyate yena tat svārtham anumānam /
SA15jithettu:305: 100. siddhe hi kāryakāraṇabhāve kāryaṃ hetur draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA15jithettu:308: asti ceha dhūma iti [ asaty agnau na bhavaty eva dhūmo yathā sajalapradeśe /
SA15jithettu:313: asati vṛkṣatve na bhavaty eva śiṃśapātvam /
SA15jithettu:315: atrāpi vyāpyavyāpakabhāve niścite sati vyāpyo hetur draṣṭavyaḥ //
SA15jithettu:319: atrāpi dṛṣyānupalambho dṛṣyābhavena vyāpto yadā niścitas tadāyaṃ hetur gamakaḥ //
SA15jithettu:323: sāmānyatodṛṣṭaṃ ceti paraiḥ kalpitam anumānaṃ sarvam anumānābhāsaḥ //
SA15jithettu:324: teṣu tādātmyatadutpattilakṣaṇasya pratibandhābhāvāt [ siddhe saty eva hi kāryakāraṇabhāve vyāpyavyāpakabhāve ca sādhyasādhanabhāvo nānyathā vyabhicārasaṃbhavāt //
SA15jithettu:325: 104. yathā vṛṣṭimān ayaṃ megho gambhīradhvanatvād iti /
SA15jithettu:327: 105. yathopari vṛṣṭo devo nadīpūradarśanāt bandhabhaṅgādināpi nadīpūrasya darśaṇāt //
SA15jithettu:328: 106. yathā pakvā ete taṇḍulā ekasthālyantargatatvād dṛṣṭataṇḍulavat //
SA15jithettu:331: atra bhūyo darśane 'pi sādhyasādhanayor vyabhicārasaṃbhava eva //
SA15jithettu:332: 108. yathā yat pārthivaṃ tat sarvaṃ lohalekhyaṃ dṛṣṭam /
SA15jithettu:337: 110. yathā yad dravad dravyam ārdrakṛt tad dṛṣṭaṃ yathodakaṃ /
